title: MSFS 2020: ATR 42-600 & 72-600 Update - New Features & Improvements! ‚úàÔ∏è
description:
In this video, we dive into the latest update for the ATR 42-600 and ATR 72-600 in Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020. Since its release in April 2023, the Expert Series 01: ATR 42-600 / 72-600 has become a favorite among virtual pilots. Today, we explore the new features and improvements in version 1.0.46, including:

- Bug fixes and performance enhancements based on community feedback.
- Introduction of the ATR 42-600S (Short Take-Off and Landing) and ATR 72-
  600F (Freighter) variants.

Join me as we take these versatile regional turboprops for a spin and see how they perform with the latest updates. 

0:00 intro
0:16 intro video
0:26 review of release notes and new versions
6:17 installing the update and first review of the freighter version
